pkgmetadata.longdescription: SciPy is an open source library of scientific tools for Python. SciPy supplements the popular numpy module, gathering a variety of high level science and engineering modules together as a single package. SciPy includes modules for graphics and plotting, optimization, integration, special functions, signal and image processing, genetic algorithms, ODE solvers, and others.
